Private task switching background.
Security improvements - new keys are signed by previous version of the key creating a chain of trust back to the initial key pair.
Remove identity from device without deleting identity in the system.
Disabled mic detection on iOS 8.
Keyboard disappearing fix.

Our response to reports that surespot has been compromised, it's simply not true: http://surespotencryptedmessenger.blogspot.com/2015/09/never-compromised.html.

Private task switching background.
Security improvements - new keys are signed by previous version of the key creating a chain of trust back to the initial key pair.
Remove identity from device without deleting identity in the system.
Disabled mic detection on iOS 8.
Keyboard disappearing fix.
Gracefully handle migration to API changes coming in next version.

NEW BETA VERSION 15 AVAILABLE! Sign up for beta here: https://surespotencryptedmessenger.blogspot.com/2016/05/beta-testing.html

Use new API.
Seamlessly handle next version which will have upgraded servers.
Bug fixes.

NEW BETA VERSION 15 AVAILABLE! Sign up for beta here: https://surespotencryptedmessenger.blogspot.com/2016/05/beta-testing.html

Use new API.
Seamlessly handle next version which will have upgraded servers.
Bug fixes.

Free voice messaging - hold down the microphone button to record, release to send.
Fast user switching - swipe drawer in from left to quickly switch between identities.
Background sending - close the app and messages will continue to send in the background.
Dark theme - (settings -> global options).
Many bug fixes and UI and performance improvements.

What's new for version 21:

Revamped notification system.
Giphy support.
30 second voice messages.
Revamped emoji/GIF/image/camera selection.
Revamped scroll handling - cleaned up some of the scrolling issues.
Updated libraries.
Updated servers.
Many many bug fixes, performance, and UI improvements.
